description: [Currently English Only - Please Read Below for Directions] **More Updates Below** Sick of everyone playing with your fancy webOS phone, draining the battery? This app gives you a "legitimate" excuse not to lend your phone to someone by popping up a low battery alert. Customized for the Pre and Pixi. Very convincing and absolutely FREE! | Updates: 1.0.3 fixes small bug. 1.0.2 now brings up a menu after typing "quit". Can now change battery level and carrier string. 1.0.1 makes closing the app harder. Now type "quit" to close the app.
